::KitKat::

She gets the message and sends one to Megatron and Aracnia. "We are 
moving, now.  I'll send you the cooridinants to the new base. Meet 
you there. And Megatron, your clone will be join you in a few 
minutes. It's programmed to obey you and you alone."
She smiled. What she didn't tell Megatron was that her scanner could 
pick up the fact that it was a clone and not him. But only her 
scanner would detect it. After all, she made it. She liked having one 
small ace in the hole.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, kinger01030@c... wrote:
>  Magnus set up the council table. It could fit 10 bots. That should 
be a 
> sufficent number. He thought of how magmatron had arrived. He knew 
he would 
> need his help but all the pain and the friends he had lost to his 
evil deeds. 
> But they faced a bigger threat now.He sent a comm to Kit 
Kat.."Hurry Kit Kat. 
> The time is near get all the pred troops here. I will round up the 
primals 
> and destrons. We will all meet in the council chamber."
